entry.title: Y1 Portable Mega Bass Bluetooth Home Speaker Compatible with All Smartphones (Assorted Colors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Music Players
Price: 4.50

  • Compact and Trendy: Enjoy an amazing audio experience on the go. Mini and compact design makes it easy to carry along anywhere you travel.
  • Powerful battery: Equipped with a 1200 mAh built-in rechargeable battery.Provides non-stop entertainment for over 5-6 hours once fully charged
  • Complete Multimedia Experience: hence you can connect it with any device like Smartphone, laptop, or computer to play music or watch videos and movies with more impactful sound. The speaker is made of durable material which adds to its durability and promises entertainment for the long run. It also supports TF card and can play Mp3 format files, Talk hands-free with a mobile phone, answer call easily. It supports speakerphone and has a built-in Microphone. This brings clear
  • Bluetooth: Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth 4.0 or below. Bluetooth range: Line of sight, 10M or 30FT, Easy to connect by Bluetooth connect a smartphone, laptop.
  • Technical details: Power output 5W*2, SNR: above 75db, Battery: 3.7V 1200 mAh built-in battery,

entry.title: Portable BT Speaker (M-11)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Music Players
Price: 5.99

  • Long, rounded cavity appearance with fabric, simple and elegant
  • Bluetooth 4.2 chip, wide compatibility, stable connection, lossless sound transmission
  • Built-in microphone, one button to answer or hang up the call, free your hands and enjoy a clear phone call
  • Support TF card and Aux-in, you could enjoy music in different ways
  • Support pre-stored music plug and play, breakpoint continuation function
  • Full frequency loudspeaker unit + professional vibration mold design
  • It improves the working state of the traditional trumpet, makes the low-frequency vigorous and forceful
  • M11 speaker combines penetrating sound blended fabric and hand processing, retro and literary, which will make your room more attractive.
  • Built-In Mic Hands-Free Speakerphone
  • Pick up a call conveniently by this fashion speaker when it is connected to your Smartphone. The speaker is made for you and simplifies your life at the same time.
  • Advanced Bluetooth 4.2 Technology
  • Unlike most other speakers, uses the very latest Bluetooth technology to maximize device compatibility and pairing speed.
  • Unstoppable Music
  • Except for connectivity via Bluetooth 4.2 and Aux-in, the TF card port enables SoundBox to become a music library by just copy your favorite music to a TF card. Let it play standalone even without any smart device connection.
